name: profs-letter
effect: Traded to the player's mom for the Town Map and a Potion.
short_effect: Traded to the player's mom for the Town Map and a Potion.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A letter that Professor Sycamore wrote
to your mother. A faint but pleasant
perfume seems to cling to the paper.
